price: Humo wataegemea matakia, wawe wanaagiza humo matunda mengi na vinywaji.
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا يَدۡعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَٰكِهَةٖ كَثِيرَةٖ وَشَرَابٖ
footnotes: Watakuwa wamekaa humo wakiegemea juu ya makochi na vitanda kama wafanyavyo wenye taanusi, wakistarehe kwa kutaka matunda ya kila namna na vinywaji.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna fīhā yadʿūna fīhā bifākihatin kathīratin washarābin
